channel.title: Learning on Alison Hill, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in Learning on Alison Hill, PhD

item.title: Learning without a net
item.description: In this talk, I shared my experiences learning new data science skills on my own, and some broader strategies for learning when you have to do it by yourself.

item.title: Teaching in Production
item.description:
This goal of this workshop is to equip educators with the tools that can help them make their teaching more robust and reproducible with R Markdown.

Trainings offered:

  • 2020-09-23
  • 2020-09-20
